mapper.select: SELECT A.ID , B.USERNAME AS USER_NAME , A.RESULT_NAME , DATE_FORMAT(A.REQ_DATE, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS REQ_DATE FROM RESULTHIS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.ID WHERE #{baseDate} = DATE_FORMAT(A.REQ_DATE,'%Y%m')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESULTHIS ( user_id , res_id , result_name , req_date ) SELECT A.USER_ID , A.RES_ID , A.RESULT_NAME , A.REQ_DATE FROM ( #{userId} AS USER_ID , #{resultName} AS RESULT_NAME , #{reqDate} AS REQ_DATE , (SELECT id FROM RESTAURANT WHERE name = #{resultName} LIMIT 1) AS RES_ID )
